articles.title: Japan expects Finland to act over offensive slant-eyes posts - 朝日新聞
articles.description: Japan expressed concern to Finland after members of the Finnish ruling coalition posted photos in which they pulled slanted eyes, a gesture offensive to Asians.
articles.content:
Japan expressed concern to Finland after members of the Finnish ruling coalition posted photos in which they pulled slanted eyes, a gesture offensive to Asians.
